korean_brands.name: Innisfree
korean_brands.description: Known for using natural ingredients from Korea's Jeju Island, offering eco-friendly skincare products.

korean_brands.name: Laneige
korean_brands.description: Famous for its Water Sleeping Mask, Laneige focuses on moisture-based skincare.

korean_brands.name: Sulwhasoo
korean_brands.description: Luxury skincare brand that incorporates traditional Korean herbal ingredients like ginseng.

korean_brands.name: Missha
korean_brands.description: Affordable and effective skincare products, known for its BB creams and Time Revolution line.

korean_brands.name: Etude House
korean_brands.description: Youthful and vibrant skincare and makeup, focusing on fun and affordable products.

korean_brands.name: The Face Shop
korean_brands.description: A wide range of natural skincare and cosmetics, using plant-based ingredients.

korean_brands.name: Cosrx
korean_brands.description: Minimalist skincare brand focusing on acne treatment and sensitive skin with simple, effective formulas.

korean_brands.name: Dr. Jart+
korean_brands.description: Dermatologist-developed skincare brand that combines science and art, known for its Cicapair and Ceramidin lines.

korean_brands.name: Banila Co
korean_brands.description: Famous for its Clean It Zero cleansing balm, focusing on effortless skincare solutions.

korean_brands.name: Tony Moly
korean_brands.description: Fun and creative skincare products with quirky packaging, appealing to younger audiences.

korean_brands.name: IOPE
korean_brands.description: Combines advanced technology with skincare, known for its Bio Essence and plant-based extracts.

korean_brands.name: Hera
korean_brands.description: Luxury skincare brand known for its high-performance anti-aging products and sunscreens.

korean_brands.name: Skinfood
korean_brands.description: Focuses on food-based skincare ingredients such as honey, rice, and black sugar.

korean_brands.name: Belif
korean_brands.description: Herbal skincare brand known for its hydration-focused products like The True Cream Aqua Bomb.

korean_brands.name: Klairs
korean_brands.description: Focused on simple, gentle, and cruelty-free skincare for sensitive skin.

korean_brands.name: Mamonde
korean_brands.description: Inspired by flowers and botanical ingredients, offering natural and feminine skincare solutions.

korean_brands.name: Nature Republic
korean_brands.description: Offers a variety of skincare products with a focus on natural ingredients like aloe vera and green tea.

korean_brands.name: Holika Holika
korean_brands.description: Fun, bold skincare and makeup products with playful packaging, known for its aloe vera soothing gel.

korean_brands.name: Amorepacific
korean_brands.description: High-end luxury brand that focuses on using green tea and other Asian botanicals in its skincare formulations.

korean_brands.name: A'PIEU
korean_brands.description: Sister brand of Missha, providing affordable yet effective skincare and makeup for younger consumers.
